name: Noah's Wacky Adventure
description:
Created by Matthew Murphy and Vilius Drumsta.

Created for My First Game Jam: Summer Edition.

This game is a platformer where you play as Noah and have to get to the end of the level to rescue the aniamal. Then you must ruch back to the ark as the water rises.

Only 1 level made so far but we will edit it with more as we work on it.

Assets used in game:

  • Font
  • Rain Maker
  • Music by Oisin Clancy
  • Sound Effects
